Subject: The NSA is Watching You: The Government, Surveillance, and You
Description: Now that Edward Snowden has made you aware that the government is watching and recording your every move, come join our GoH Eva Galperin and Featured Guests Cory Doctorow and Nick Farr as they discuss of the implications of living in a surveillance state.   Speakers include:Eva Galperin, Cory Doctorow, Nick Farr - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Ridiculous Ideas in Space Travel
Description: There are only three rules: Ridiculous, Plausible, Entertaining. All of our amazing panelists have agreed to present their ideas for Space Travel that fulfill each of these rules and are willing to suffer your silly and serious questions and comments on each. Come for the science, stay for the laughs!  Speakers include:Nick Farr, Eva Galperin, Jeff Goeke-Smith, Jolly - Track: Science  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: The Biggest Game of Cards Against Humanity Ever Played
Description: We're going to attempt the biggest game of Cards Against Humanity ever.  Even if you've only heard about this wild tabletop game, show up for the fun and stay for the chaos.  Speakers include:Nick Farr, M'jit Raindancer-Stahl, Dean Stahl - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 2 hours and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Your Personal Penguicon with a Passport!
Description: It's finally time: You need to visit Germany and Japan! Whatever your interest is, odds are you'll find a unique spin on it overseas that will change your life and how you view humanity. With nearly half a million transcontinental miles flown east and west, Nick Farr will regale you with tales of the geekiest highlights in both countries and tips on how to have an authentic, safe, geeky and budget-conscious international trip to Germany and Japan.  Speakers include:Nick Farr - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Bitcoin, Dogecoin, and Cryptocurrencies… What’s the Big Deal?
Description: What's a cryptocurrency and why do we need it? What is Bitcoin mining? Why is Bitcoin so volatile? What is this scary new money and why is it important in our ever-changing world?  Speakers include:YTCracker, Nick Farr - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
